text: Hey Lou, it’s Jon! Loved connecting with you. Enjoy Vegas!
Todd, thanks for connecting on LinkedIn. I have an IT opportunity that fits what you’re looking for.
Your interview at Citizens Bank is at 11am tomorrow on 101 Poe Street.
Hi Joy. Your massage is scheduled for 4/27/21 at 12:00 PM.
Good morning EY marketing! For the team picnic tomorrow please reply with what you’re bringing.
